name: 17x17 Animator
description: A tiny animation tool :) (Full screen is best) Icons: frame backward, set loop frame, frame forward, previous frame copy (3 clicks), onion skin, save frame, save as json (copy from text field), export gif, clear (click 3 times to clear project), play / stop. Click and drag or just click for dots. Clear dot by clicking with the same color. 3 clicks of a color fills the frame, 4 clicks clears the frame :) Load data by pasting animation json and clicking “Load”. By @LorenBednar
